title: RFC 5322 Email Address (Addr-Spec)
description: An Internet email address in addr-spec format as defined in RFC 5322 section 3.4.1. The addr-spec consists of a local-part, the at-sign (@), and a domain. The local-part may be a dot-atom, quoted-string, or obsolete form. The domain may be a dot-atom, domain-literal (IP address in brackets), or obsolete form. Comments and folding white space are permitted in various positions per the RFC specification.
